meanings.sent1: After the rain, the sun came out and started regreening the grass.
meanings.sent2: The community is working on regreening the park to make it more beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The magical wand was so powerful that it could regreen anything it touched.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was like regreening a barren land with hope and joy.
meanings.sent5: The gardener's touch seemed to regreen even the most neglected plants.

meanings.definition: The act of restoring greenery to an area.
meanings.sent1: The regreening of the desert was a remarkable achievement for the environmentalists.
meanings.sent2: The regreening of the city park brought back the beauty of nature to the urban landscape.
meanings.sent3: The regreening project turned the once dull space into a vibrant oasis.
meanings.sent4: The regreening effort transformed the barren land into a lush paradise.
meanings.sent5: The regreening initiative inspired the community to take better care of their surroundings.
